titles.title: A bill to require that fifty-dollar bills bear a portrait of Georgia Neese Clark Gray, the first woman to serve as Treasurer of the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs and Coinage.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Requires that all $50 bills bear a portrait of Georgia Neese Clark Gray, the first woman to serve as Treasurer of the United States.
